caption.title: The structure of HA tri-stalk at pH 5.5.
caption.p: Side (A) and top (B) view on tri-stalk protein. Individual monomers are colored in red, green and yellow. (C) Structural alignment of HA tri-stalk protein (blue) with the corresponding stem fragment of native post-fusion HA (grey) (PDB code 1HTM, residues 63 to 127). Only matching sequence length is shown for clarity.
